name: The Other Side (LRVStudios)
description:
Instructions:

Use W|A|S|D to move the character; Mouse or Arrow Keys to rotate the Camera.

Press Left Click to enlight your way. Right Click for cry (increase your mood)

Press Space for Jump. You can Die or use the portal to migrate from "Level" to "Limbo" and otherwise.

This is a game made in less than 72h for a gamJam and is still in development. Hope you like it.
